title: Acadia National Park: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather              Weather       Seasons Spring Foggy; 30-70 F (-1-21 C) Wear light-colored clothing, long sleeve shirts, and long pants for protection. Summer Daytime: 45-90 F (7-32 C) Ocean temperature: 50-60 F (10-16 C) Lake temperatures: 55-70 F (13-21 C) Fall Variable weather; 30-70 F (-1-21 C) For information on changing leaves, click here. Winter Variable; 14-35 F (-10-2 C) For the latest weather information, call 207-667-8910 or 207-288-3338.    Current Conditions  National Weather Service For current conditions in Acadia National Park, click here. Real-Time Air Quality Web Cameras and Weather Data  McFarland Hill Site (National Park Service) Schoodic Peninsula site (Northeast States for Coordinated Air Use Management)  Ozone Information   Maine Department of Environment Protection Air Quality Hotline: 800-223-1196     It's a bird! It's a plane! It's the ISS! If you've ever wondered when you can see the International Space Station over Acadia, this widget is just for you!
